soup1.cooking_instructions: Add butter, onion, a large can of tomatoes, and water to a large pot. Bring everything to a low simmer and cook for 40 minutes. Once done, blend the soup until smooth. Adjust the soup with salt and pepper, then grab a bowl and enjoy!
soup1.ingredients: Fresh tomatoes (2 pounds, blended), half a large onion, butter

soup2.cooking_instructions: In a large pot over medium heat, add the butter and onions. Cook until the onions turn translucent, 3 to 4 minutes, but don't let them brown at all. Season with a pinch of salt. Add the carrots, garlic, and dried thyme, and stir together. Cook for 30 seconds, just until garlic becomes fragrant. Add the stock and bring mixture to a simmer. Cover and simmer for 15 more minutes until the carrots are very tender. When the carrots are tender, use an immersion blender right in the pot to blend soup until smooth. Ladle the soup into bowls and swirl in about a tablespoon of heavy cream into each bowl. Garnish the soup with a sprinkle of paprika and fresh minced chives.
soup2.ingredients: 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 1 large white onion (chopped), 2 pounds carrots (peeled and chopped), 3 clove garlic (chopped), 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 4 cups vegetable stock, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon white pepper, 4 tablespoons heavy cream

soup3.coooking_instructions: Melt 2 tbsp of butter in a large pot. Add garlic and shallot, cook for 1 minute until they begin to soften. Add all the mushrooms and cook for about 3 mins until tender and browned. Transfer all contents to a bowl. Add remaining 1 tbsp of butter to the pot. Once melted, sprinkle in the flour and whisk it quickly into a paste. Reduce heat to medium. Add the stock a little at a time, whisking out the clumps between each addition. Increase heat back to medium-high and allow the soup to simmer well for 3 mins. Add the musrooms back to the pot and continue to cook for 2 more minutes. The stock will thicken slightly to a somewhat creamy consistency. Let cook for 3 to 4 minutes, then ladle into bowls. Garnish with musrooms and parsley.
soup3.ingredients: 3 tbsp unsalted butter, 2 minced garlic cloves, 1 finely chopped shallots, 4 ounces of chopped crimini mushrooms, 4 ounces of chopped white button mushrooms, 2 tbsp all purpose flour, 3 cups chicken stock, 1/4 tsp fine sea salt, 1/4 tsp ground black pepper, sliced sauteed mushrooms for garnish, chopped parsley for garnish.
